text: A Husband for Anna () is a 1953 Italian romantic drama movie directed by Giuseppe De Santis and starring Silvana Pampanini, Amedeo Nazzari, Massimo Girotti, Umberto Spadaro, Monica Clay. == Other websites == * Category:1953 romantic drama movies Category:Italian romance movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Giuseppe De Santis
title: A Husband for Anna
